sentences.en: Being deaf hasn’t stopped Karen fulfilling her ambition to be a hairdresser.
sentences.cn: 失聪并没有阻止卡伦实现当美发师的抱负。

sentences.en: He pledged to fulfil his trust.
sentences.cn: 他保证履行义务.

sentences.en: He really wants to fulfil his role as goddaughter properly.
sentences.cn: 他确实想好好履行作为教女的职责.

sentences.en: He really wants to fulfil his role as godfather properly.
sentences.cn: 他确实想好好履行作为教父的职责.

sentences.en: He really wants to fulfil his role as godson properly.
sentences.cn: 他确实想好好履行作为教子的职责.

sentences.en: I pledged myself to fulfil the promise I had made.
sentences.cn: 我保证实践自己的诺言.

sentences.en: It was then that the organization finally began to fulfill the hopes of its founders.
sentences.cn: 直到那时，该组织才终于开始实现其创办人的愿望。

sentences.en: Not all foreign visitors satisfy / fulfil legal entry requirements.
sentences.cn: 并非所有外宾均符合入境规定.

sentences.en: Seaways and landway would continue to fulfil vital functions.
sentences.cn: 海路和陆路将继续发挥重要的功能.

sentences.en: She succeeded in fulfil ( l ) ing herself as an actress.
sentences.cn: 她作为演员充分发挥了自己的才能.

sentences.en: She was compelled to fulfil the dying wishes of her mother.
sentences.cn: 她不得不去实现她母亲的临终遗愿。

sentences.en: The builder failed to fulfil the terms of his obligation.
sentences.cn: 营造商未能履行合同的条款.

sentences.en: The Editor can give no guarantee that they will fulfil their obligations.
sentences.cn: 《编辑家》无法保证他们会履行职责.

sentences.en: There are also people who leave their work to fulfil an old dream.
sentences.cn: 也有一些人离开他们的工作是为了实现自己的夙愿.

sentences.en: There is little doubt that the scheme fulfils a need for our community.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，这计划会满足我们社区的需求。

sentences.en: These illustrations fulfil ( l ) the text.
sentences.cn: 这些插图使正文 臻 于完备.

sentences.en: This company should be able to fulfil our requirements.
sentences.cn: 这家公司应该能够满足我们的要求。

sentences.en: This diet will fulfil your needs in food.
sentences.cn: 这样的饮食将会满足你的食物需要.

sentences.en: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream .
sentences.cn: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

sentences.en: Visiting Disneyland has fulfilled a boyhood dream.
sentences.cn: 迪士尼乐园之游使童年梦想成真。

trans.tran_en: to do or provide what is necessary or needed

trans.tran_cn: 履行（条约，义务），遵守，执行（命令等），完成（计划等），做完（工作），达到（目的），应验（预言等），满足（希望），使臻于完善，充分发挥潜在的能力
trans.tran_en: if you fulfil a hope, wish, or aim, you achieve the thing that you hoped for, wished for etc
